title: Marketplace Roundtable #45: J Mintzmyer Interviews Michael Boyd About Energy
description: In today's special edition of the Marketplace Roundtable Podcast, we feature a table-turner: J Mintzmyer, author of Value Investor's Edge, is the interviewer this time, as Michael Boyd of the newly renamed Energy Income Authority joins him to discuss the opportunity in the energy sector, why he's focusing on that segment, and what parts he is avoiding or looking for buys in.
itunes:title: J Mintzmyer Interviews Michael Boyd About Energy
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: In light of a shift in Michael Boyd's service, the authors discuss the opportunity in the energy sector.
